## Conditional Testing

```javascript
 cy.get('[data-cy="dialog-cancel"]')
      .should('not.exist').then(() => {
        cy.get('[data-cy="dialog-confirm"]')
          .should('not.exist');
      });
```

## About blank

```javascript
afterEach(() => {
    cy.window().then((win) => {
      win.location.href = 'about:blank'
    });
  });
```

## API Request mit Wertspeicherung

```javascript
export const simulateTesttakerLoginForGroupmon = () => {
  // Request 1: Anmeldung und Token speichern
  cy.request({
    method: 'PUT',
    url: 'http://localhost/api/session/login',
    headers: {
      'content-type': `application/json`,
      'Accept': `text/csv`
    },
    body: {
      "name": "test",
      "password": "user123"
    }
  }).then((response) => {
    const authToken = response.body.token;
    expect(response.status).to.eq(200);

    cy.wait(2000);  // oder cy.wait(500) fÃ¼r 500ms

    // Request 2: Code eingeben
    cy.request({
      method: 'PUT',
      url: 'http://localhost/api/session/person',
      headers: {
        'content-type': `application/json`,
        'Accept': `text/csv`,
        'AuthToken': `${authToken}`
      },
      body: {
        "code": "yyy"
      }
    }).then((response) => {
     // Cypress.env('authTokenPers', response.body.token);
      expect(response.status).to.eq(200);
    });
  });
  ```
